_comment: Created by NCODowd on 24/05/2016 16:31:54 using v2.7
title: Perceptions of the quality of care for community mental health services
analysis_commentary: These data have been taken from annual surveys. Since 2013, people were asked to rate their overall care experience from 0 (very poor) to 10 (very good). Three quarters of people gave their care a score of at least 6 out of 10 in 2013 and 2014, which dropped slightly to 72% in 2015. The proportion of people reporting an overall poor experience increased in 2015.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
